Norfolk.Old Dominion Soccer Complex:
The Old Dominion Soccer Complex is a soccer-specific stadium located on the campus of Old Dominion University in Norfolk, Virginia, USA. The 4,000-seat stadium is home to the Old Dominion Monarchs and Lady Monarchs soccer teams. The Monarchs compete in Conference USA. The stadium is also the host of the annual Stihl/ODU Soccer Classic.
The stadium opened in 1990 replacing the university's football stadium, Foreman Field, as the home of Old Dominion soccer.
